file.name: poc-space.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: PoCSpace
  version: '1.0'
  description: Classic CRUD Api to manage cosmonauts
  contact:
    name: 'Tom '
    url: 'https://github.com/TomChv'
    email: tom.chauveau@epitech.eu
  license:
    name: MIT
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:7600'
paths:
  /ping:
    get:
      summary: Check health
      tags:
        - Ping
      responses:
        '200':
          description: pong
      operationId: get-ping
      description: Verify if API is responding correctly
  '/cosmo/{id}':
    get:
      summary: Get cosmonaut
      tags:
        - Cosmonaut
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: string
                      format: uuid
                    name:
                      type: string
                      example: Foo
                    mission:
                      type: string
                      enum:
                        - ISS
                        - MOON
                        - MARS
                      example: ISS
                    country:
                      type: string
                      enum:
                        - France
                        - United-State
                        - Russia
                        - China
                        - India
                      example: France
                    suit:
                      type: object
                      required:
                        - helmet
                        - body
                        - gloves
                        - boots
                      properties:
                        helmet:
                          type: object
                          required:
                            - color
                            - id
                          properties:
                            color:
                              type: string
                              enum:
                                - blue
                                - red
                                - green
                                - black
                                - yellow
                                - pink
                                - white
                                - purple
                              example: purple
                            id:
                              type: string
                              format: uuid
                        body:
                          type: object
                          required:
                            - color
                            - kind
                            - id
                          properties:
                            color:
                              type: string
                              enum:
                                - blue
                                - red
                                - green
                                - black
                                - yellow
                                - pink
                                - white
                                - purple
                              example: red
                            kind:
                              type: string
                              enum:
                                - EMU
                                - CES
                                - SOKOL
                                - RO
                              example: EMU
                            id:
                              type: string
                              format: uuid
                        gloves:
                          type: object
                          required:
                            - color
                            - id
                          properties:
                            color:
                              type: string
                              enum:
                                - blue
                                - red
                                - green
                                - black
                                - yellow
                                - pink
                                - white
                                - purple
                              example: purple
                            id:
                              type: string
                              format: uuid
                        boots:
                          type: object
                          required:
                            - color
                            - id
                          properties:
                            color:
                              type: string
                              enum:
                                - blue
                                - red
                                - green
                                - black
                                - yellow
                                - pink
                                - white
                                - purple
                              example: white
                            id:
                              type: string
                  required:
                    - id
                    - name
                    - mission
                    - country
                    - suit
              examples:
                Exemple:
                  value:
                    - id: 497f6eca-6276-4993-bfeb-53cbbbba6f08
                      name: Foo
                      mission: ISS
                      country: France
                      suit:
                        helmet:
                          color: purple
                          id: 497f6eca-6276-4993-bfeb-53cbbbba6f08
                        body:
                          color: red
                          kind: EMU
                          id: 497f6eca-6276-4993-bfeb-53cbbbba6f08
                        gloves:
                          color: purple
                          id: 497f6eca-6276-4993-bfeb-53cbbbba6f08
                        boots:
                          color: white
                          id: string
                    - id: 497f6eca-6276-4993-bfeb-53cbbbba6f08
                      name: Foo
                      mission: ISS
                      country: France
                      suit:
                        helmet:
                          color: purple
                          id: 497f6eca-6276-4993-bfeb-53cbbbba6f08
                        body:
                          color: red
                          kind: EMU
                          id: 497f6eca-6276-4993-bfeb-53cbbbba6f08
                        gloves:
                          color: purple
                          id: 497f6eca-6276-4993-bfeb-53cbbbba6f08
                        boots:
                          color: white
                          id: string
        '404':
          description: Not Found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
              examples:
                Example:
                  value: Id xxxxx not found
        '503':
          description: Service Unavailable
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: Service Unavalaible
      operationId: get-cosmo
      description: Get all cosmonauts
      parameters: []
    post:
      summary: Create cosmonaut
      operationId: post-cosmo
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: ''
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  name:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  mission:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  country:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  suit:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      helmet:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          color:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                          id:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                        required:
                          - color
                          - id
                      body:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          color:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                          kind:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                          id:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                        required:
                          - color
                          - kind
                          - id
                      gloves:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          color:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                          id:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                        required:
                          - color
                          - id
                      boots:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          color:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                          id:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                        required:
                          - color
                          - id
                    required:
                      - helmet
                      - body
                      - gloves
                      - boots
                required:
                  - id
                  - name
                  - mission
                  - country
                  - suit
              examples:
                Exemple:
                  value:
                    id: 497f6eca-6276-4993-bfeb-53cbbbba6f08
                    name: Foo
                    mission: ISS
                    country: France
                    suit:
                      helmet:
                        color: purple
                        id: 497f6eca-6276-4993-bfeb-53cbbbba6f08
                      body:
                        color: red
                        kind: EMU
                        id: 497f6eca-6276-4993-bfeb-53cbbbba6f08
                      gloves:
                        color: purple
                        id: 497f6eca-6276-4993-bfeb-53cbbbba6f08
                      boots:
                        color: white
                        id: string
          headers: {}
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: Cosmonaut must wear a suit
              examples:
                Bad request:
                  value: Bad Request
        '503':
          description: Service Unavailable
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: Service Unavalaible
      description: Create a cosmonaut
      tags:
        - Cosmonaut
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              description: ''
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                  minLength: 1
                mission:
                  type: string
                  minLength: 1
                country:
                  type: string
                  minLength: 1
                suit:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    helmet:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        color:
                          type: string
                          minLength: 1
                      required:
                        - color
                    body:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        color:
                          type: string
                          minLength: 1
                        kind:
                          type: string
                          minLength: 1
                      required:
                        - color
                        - kind
                    gloves:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        color:
                          type: string
                          minLength: 1
                      required:
                        - color
                    boots:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        color:
                          type: string
                          minLength: 1
                      required:
                        - color
                  required:
                    - helmet
                    - body
                    - gloves
                    - boots
              required:
                - name
                - mission
                - country
                - suit
            examples:
              Exemple:
                value:
                  name: Foo
                  mission: ISS
                  country: France
                  suit:
                    helmet:
                      color: purple
                    body:
                      color: red
                      kind: EMU
                    gloves:
                      color: purple
                    boots:
                      color: white
        description: Cosmonaut body
      parameters: []
    parameters:
      - schema:
          type: string
        name: id
        in: path
        description: Cosmonaut ID
    patch:
      summary: Modify cosmonaut
      operationId: patch-cosmo
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                  name:
                    type: string
                  mission:
                    type: string
                  country:
                    type: string
                  suit:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      helmet:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          color:
                            type: string
                          id:
                            type: string
                      body:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          color:
                            type: string
                          kind:
                            type: string
                          id:
                            type: string
                      gloves:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          color:
                            type: string
                          id:
                            type: string
                      boots:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          color:
                            type: string
                          id:
                            type: string
              examples:
                Example:
                  value:
                    id: 497f6eca-6276-4993-bfeb-53cbbbba6f08
                    name: Foo
                    mission: ISS
                    country: France
                    suit:
                      helmet:
                        color: purple
                        id: 497f6eca-6276-4993-bfeb-53cbbbba6f08
                      body:
                        color: red
                        kind: EMU
                        id: 497f6eca-6276-4993-bfeb-53cbbbba6f08
                      gloves:
                        color: purple
                        id: 497f6eca-6276-4993-bfeb-53cbbbba6f08
                      boots:
                        color: white
                        id: string
        '400':
          description: Bad Request
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
              examples:
                Example:
                  value: Color xxxx isn't valid
        '404':
          description: Not Found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
              examples:
                Example:
                  value: Id xxxxx not found
        '503':
          description: Service Unavailable
      description: Modify cosmonaut attributs
      parameters: []
      tags:
        - Cosmonaut
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              description: ''
              type: object
              properties:
                helmet:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    color:
                      type: string
                      minLength: 1
                  required:
                    - color
                body:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    color:
                      type: string
                      minLength: 1
                    kind:
                      type: string
                      minLength: 1
                  required:
                    - color
                    - kind
                gloves:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    color:
                      type: string
                      minLength: 1
                  required:
                    - color
                boots:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    color:
                      type: string
                      minLength: 1
                  required:
                    - color
              required:
                - helmet
                - body
                - gloves
                - boots
            examples:
              Example:
                value:
                  helmet:
                    color: purple
                  body:
                    color: blue
                    kind: EMU
                  gloves:
                    color: green
                  boots:
                    color: white
        description: New cosmo properties
    delete:
      summary: Delete cosmonaut
      operationId: delete-cosmo
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
              examples:
                Example:
                  value: User XXXX has been successfully deleted
        '404':
          description: Not Found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
              examples:
                Example:
                  value: Id xxxx not found
      description: Delete a cosmonaut
      tags:
        - Cosmonaut
  '/fly/{id}':
    patch:
      summary: Fly cosmonaut
      operationId: patch-fly-id
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Updated cosmonaut
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: ''
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  name:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  mission:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  country:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 1
                  suit:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      helmet:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          color:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                          id:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                        required:
                          - color
                          - id
                      body:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          color:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                          kind:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                          id:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                        required:
                          - color
                          - kind
                          - id
                      gloves:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          color:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                          id:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                        required:
                          - color
                          - id
                      boots:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          color:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                          id:
                            type: string
                            minLength: 1
                        required:
                          - color
                          - id
                    required:
                      - helmet
                      - body
                      - gloves
                      - boots
                required:
                  - id
                  - name
                  - mission
                  - country
                  - suit
              examples:
                Example:
                  value:
                    id: string
                    name: string
                    mission: string
                    country: string
                    suit:
                      helmet:
                        color: string
                        id: string
                      body:
                        color: string
                        kind: string
                        id: string
                      gloves:
                        color: string
                        id: string
                      boots:
                        color: string
                        id: string
        '404':
          description: Not Found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
              examples:
                No suit:
                  value: You must wear a suit to go outside earth
                Not found:
                  value: Id xxxx not found
      description: Put cosmonaut on a mission
      parameters:
        - schema:
            type: string
          in: query
          name: mission
          description: Mission type
          required: true
      tags:
        - Fly
    parameters:
      - schema:
          type: string
        name: id
        in: path
        required: true
        description: Cosmonaut id
components:
  schemas: {}
  securitySchemes: {}
  parameters: {}
tags:
  - name: Cosmonaut
  - name: Ping
  - name: Fly

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: /cosmo/{id}: parameters: parse parameter "id": path parameters must be required
